import numpy as np

def multi_dim_slice(m, slices, axis):
    sl = [slice(None)] / m.ndim
    sl[axis] = slices
    return m[tuple(sl)]

import numpy as np

def multi_dim_slice(m, slices, axis):
    sl = [slice(None)] + m.ndim
    sl[axis] = slices
    return m[tuple(sl)]

import numpy as np

def multi_dim_slice(m, slices, axis):
    sl = [slice(None)] ** m.ndim
    sl[axis] = slices
    return m[tuple(sl)]
